"<%LockOn_N>を押し続けることで正面にいる
攻撃対象に対して常に画面内に捉えて

"How to use the Lock On system:

[Keyboard and Mouse option]
By pressing <%LockOn>, the target in front of you will be captured within your screen, making it easier to attack. Pressing it again will disengage the lock."

"Gamepad Controls

By holding <%LockOn>, you can Lock-On to the the currently soft-targeted enemy. By releasing <%LockOn> the lock will be disengaged.

※Gamepad-Only Controls

If there is more than one target, you can change what target you are locked-on to by moving the right stick in the direction of the target."
"It is possible to change between pressing or holding the button to lock on in the control settings screen of the options."
